title: 1119 31 "The Entrusted Message! King Cobra's Resolve"Transliteration: "Takusareta Messēji! Kobura-Ō no Kakugo" (Japanese:託された伝言！コブラ王の覚悟) Yasuhiro Tanabe Atsuhiro Tomioka Ziwei He &Masahiro Shimanuki September 15, 2024(2024-09-15) 2.5%[35]
transformers_text:
1119 31 "The Entrusted Message! King Cobra's Resolve"Transliteration: "Takusareta Messēji! Kobura-Ō no Kakugo" (Japanese:託された伝言！コブラ王の覚悟) Yasuhiro Tanabe Atsuhiro Tomioka Ziwei He &Masahiro Shimanuki September 15, 2024(2024-09-15) 2.5%[35]

Imu reveals to Cobra that "D." links to a historic mistake by Nefertari Lili, which unleashed the Poneglyphs. After Cobra confirms Lili’s full name has a "D." in it, Imu stabs him. Sabo intervenes but flees with Cobra, who wants to send a message to Luffy and Vivi that the entire Nefertari family has "D." in their names. Sabo escapes, while Wapol, who witnesses Cobra's murder, runs away. Meanwhile, Vivi is restrained by CP0 but manages to escape with Wapol.
